content.rendered:
Expert Forum: Navigating Cyber Insurance with FifthWall Solutions & techrug

With the sheer frequency of cyber-attacks on businesses over the last two years, cyber insurance is quickly becoming a necessity to ensure losses are covered in the event of a malicious cyber-attack. Demand for this type of protection has increased faster than most can get their heads around, leaving us with crucial questions as to how cyber insurance works and just how well our businesses are being protected.

Watch as Shawn Brown, Snap Tech IT COO, sits down with Wes Spencer of FifthWall Solutions & Justin Reinmuth of techrug to discuss:

• How to lower insurance premiums with a few security controls

• What is covered in a cyber insurance policy

• One size doesn’t fit all – how cyber insurance policies are different

• Eligibility requirements for cyber insurance

Have questions? Contact us: https://www.snaptechit.com/contact/. For more cybersecurity education, visit the Resources Center: https://www.snaptechit.com/resources/
